Credits Introduction

Grimwire and Local.js (MIT license) were created by Paul Frazee. Special thanks to Austin-based Goodybag, Inc for their support. By providing funds and office space, they made completing this software possible.

    • jQuery Foundation, jQuery (MIT License)
    • Hunter Perrin, Pines Notify (GPL, LGPL, MPL license)

If anybody is missing from this list, please file an issue so that we can correct the mistake.
